author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA BECOMING LESS ORGANIZED AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS...
summary: ...MELISSA BECOMING LESS ORGANIZED AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 8:00 PM AST Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 31.3, -68.9 with movement NE at 32 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA BECOMING LESS ORGANIZED AS IT MOVES RAPIDLY NORTHEASTWARD... ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE DURING THE NEXT SEVERAL HOURS... As of 8:00 PM AST Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 31.3, -68.9 with movement NE at 32 mph. The minimum central pressure was 970 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
